segments.text: I am really impressed with your presentation skills .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I have been working on it for several years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , your time has been well spent !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It also helps that I have strong team members , such as yourself . You really know your stuff !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , but I have to admit I am really good at bluffing !
segments.speaker: S1
